name: The Sky Pirates
description:
by Caleb Noller

Embark on a journey of discovery through a port in the sky.

 

Controls

  • WASD: move
  • Mouse: look around

 

See also:

  • Mountain Monastery: Hike to the top of a peaceful mountain
  • Susurrus: A narrative adventure inspired by 90's multimedia games, walking simulators and film
